title: Sergio Ojeda (boxer)
text: Sergio Ojeda (23 January 1906 – 1 January 1996) was a Chilean <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201928%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20light%20heavyweight">men's light heavyweight</a> event at the <a href="1928%20Summer%20Olympics">1928 Summer Olympics</a>.
